content.question: In the first sentence of the passage, the speaker's attitude toward the material is that of a person who is

choices.label: fascinated by the unique capabilities of individual characters
so familiar with the realm described as to be somewhat cynical
coolly assessing random data in search of a possible pattern
overtly sympathetic toward the subjects of the discussion

content.answer: so familiar with the realm described as to be somewhat cynical
